name: Xue Li 0001
content: ï»¿ Prof. Xue Li`s Web Page ProfessorXue Li Google Scholar Time Table Dr Xue Li is honoured as one of "the most powerful people in Australia" on Big Data by the Financial Review - the Power Issue 2015 Dr Xue Li is a Professor in the School of Information Technology and Electrical Engineering at the University of Queensland (UQ) in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. Dr Xue Li holds a Professor title in School of Medicine in Griffith University, Gold Coast, Queensland, Australia. His major areas of research interests and expertise include: Health Data Analytics, Data Mining, Social Computing, and Intelligent Web Information Systems. More About Me Education â¢	PhD (Information Systems), Queensland University of Technology, 1997 â¢	Msc (Computer Science), The University of Queensland, 1989 â¢	BSc (Computer Science), Chongqing University, 1982 Committees â¢	Founder and Chair of Steering Committee of ADMA (International Conferences on Advanced Data Mining and Applications) since 2004, Published with Springer Germany. â¢	President of QCF (Queensland Chinese Forum) for joint of 22 Chinese Associations in Queensland 2010-2011. â¢	President of CCCPCC (Chinese Community Crime Prevention Consultative Committee) with Queensland Police Department, Queensland Government, 2010 â 2011. â¢	President and Board member of Miaomiao Chinese School (2004-2006, operating on 4 campuses with more than 1000 students learning Chinese Language in Brisbane). â¢	Editor on Board, (2004-2007) International Journal of Information Systems and Management & Technology, Elsevier. â¢	Program Committee Chair for the 12th AusDM conference in 2014 (the premier Australasian Data Mining Conference). â¢	Local Chair of 2015 ACM Multimedia International Conference (ERA A) Brisbane, â¢	Publicity Chair of REID 1999 International Conference (in conjunction to ICDE Data Engineering). â¢	Program (PC) Chairs for five international conferences (ADMA05, ADMA06, FSKD06, AIDM05, ICISW05). â¢	Expert Reviewer for Australian ARC Funding Applications (since 2001). â¢	Member of ACS (Australian Computer Society), IEEE, ACM. Work Experience â¢	Professor in School of Information Technology and Electrical Engineering, at the University of Queensland, St Lucia, Brisbane. Current â¢	Senior Lecturer in School of Information Systems, Technology and Management, at University of New South Wales, Sydney. 1998 â 2000 â¢	Lecturer in School of Information Systems & School of Computing at Queensland University of Technology, Gardens Point, Brisbane. 1990 â 1998 Publication 168 2017 2016 2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 2004 2003 2002 and before Teaching Reseach Awards Supervision PhD & MPhil Student Post-Doctor 2017 Journal Sen Wang, Xue Li, Xiaojun Chang, Lina Yao, Quan Z.
